thread.title: Jay Johnston
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Jay Johnston

author: Jay Johnston
title: Jay Johnston
text:
My Shower mixer was getting colder and colder and I contacted shower doctor with the symptoms
I was advised that worn seals was the likely answer
I spent an hour yesterday changing cleaning and rebuilding the valve and had an absolutely joyous hot shower this morning
Thanks Gang!
